steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8jk3q","text":"Perform cells count ensuring working in same units.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a99ii","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d682a","text":"A=________\tB=________\tAverage A \u0026 B =_____________","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":1,"offset":8,"style":"sup"},{"length":1,"offset":29,"style":"sup"}],"key":"h98f","text":"e.g. x105 cells per mL or x106 cells per mL.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
